page.title: 13STANS'D ST.MARG'TS-AMENITIES
page.content: {SQUARES 3711 & 3811 {SERVICES}provided are 4 bus stops, a water-pumping station with a 200ft. well serving the nearby area & a school for the mentally & physically handicapped. {RECREATION }in the St.Margarets area includes one sports club with 3 tennis courts, 2 football pitches & 1 cricket pitch. There is also a play area for children. The River Lea is important: it provides opportunity for economic growth (especially in summer) due to the number of day-trippers it attracts. Stanstead Abbotts has 5 pubs, a wine bar & a restaurant. The river is also a good site for industry & boat-building occurs at Rye Meads (a marsh area on the village edge). Here large boating lakes exist, mainly owned by the Stanstead Abbotts Boating Club.
